name: Un-ren-table
description:
Un-ren-table

Here is our entry for the 49th Ludum Dare ! The theme was "Unstable". Here our LD link if you're a participant and want to rate it : https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49/un-ren-table-our-game-is-out

You have been chosen by the Magic Academy to build their new magical school for their (really really dumb) new-comers ! The only problem is... the Year has already started and now you'll have to build as they arrive ! They'll want to try their new spells as soon as possible so you have to build them the highest tower you can, they'll pay you their rent with Mana! The HIGHER your tower is, the more new student will come, the more MANA you'll gain, so go UP ! ... We hope they won’t make too UNSTABLE your tower ... Controls :
  • Click to select and add a new room upon the tower base.
  • Use mouse wheel to scroll the scene or Arrow up and Down

Update V1.3 : 

  • Now support 4K
  • Splash screen was missing
  • Tweaked reputation (aka : the higher tower the better) system for fairer run
  • Fixed roof piece being buggy
  • Fix wrong font (making some text unreadable)

Update V1.2 : 

  • Help panel now close properly
  • Many minor fixes 

Update V1.1 : 

  • Right view port

- QUASAR SHRINE -

- WegPast - Arktas - Lut1n -
